snippet: Former Representative Gabrielle Giffords and her husband, Mark E. Kelly, unveiled a new campaign against gun violence on Tuesday, the second anniversary of the shooting in a Tucson shopping center that killed six people and left Ms. Giffords...
abstract: Former Representative Gabrielle Giffords and her husband, Mark E. Kelly, unveiled a new campaign against gun violence on Tuesday, the second anniversary of the shooting in a Tucson shopping center that killed six people and left Ms. Giffords critically injured.

headline.main: Giffords and Husband Announce Campaign Against Gun Violence
